Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(streaming-server): Add ESM import extensions for Node.js compatibility

Fixed module resolution errors in streaming-server by adding .js extensions
to all local imports. Node.js ESM requires explicit file extensions for 
relative imports.

Changes:
- Added .js extensions to all local imports in src/ directory
- Updated 7 TypeScript files (server, routes, services, utils)
- Bumped tsx and nodemon versions for better ESM support

ESM Import Fixes:
- server.ts: StreamingService, OfflineRenderer, SSEManager, routes
- routes/stream.ts: StreamingService, SSEManager
- routes/health.ts: StreamingService, SSEManager  
- services/StreamingService.ts: OfflineRenderer, SSEManager, BufferSerializer, types
- services/OfflineRenderer.ts: types
- services/SSEManager.ts: types
- utils/buffer-serializer.ts: types

Dependencies:
- tsx: 4.7.0 â†’ 4.20.6
- nodemon: 3.0.2 â†’ 3.1.10

Streaming server now starts successfully with tsx runtime.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

## ðŸŽ¯ BOC-5: End-to-End Integration

### Integrated Server Architecture

Created `integrated-server.ts` that unifies all services in a single process:

**âœ… Shared Architecture:**
- Single `AudioEventBus` instance shared across all services
- WebhookService â†’ MusicMapper â†’ StreamingService pipeline
- Event-driven coordination working correctly
- All services initialized and running together

**âœ… Components Integrated:**
- **Webhook Server** (port 3000): Receives GitHub webhooks
- **Music Mapper**: Transforms webhook events to musical parameters
- **Streaming Server** (port 3001): Streams audio to browsers via SSE
- **Dashboard** (port 3000/dashboard): Real-time event monitoring

**âœ… Integration Flow:**
```
GitHub Event â†’ Webhook Server â†’ AudioEventBus.publish()
  â†“
MusicMapper subscribes â†’ generates musical parameters
  â†“
StreamingService subscribes â†’ renders audio offline
  â†“
SSE broadcast â†’ Browser clients play audio
```

**ðŸ”§ Critical Fix:**
- Fixed separate AudioEventBus instances issue
- All services now use shared event bus for communication
- Events published in webhook-server reach music-engine and streaming-server
